import*as yup from"yup";const passwordRules=/^(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z]).{5,}$/;// min 5 characters, 1 upper case letter, 1 lower case letter, 1 numeric digit.
export const setNewPasswordSchema=yup.object().shape({password:yup.string().min(5).matches(passwordRules,{message:"Please create a stronger password"}).required("Required"),confirmPassword:yup.string().oneOf([yup.ref("password"),null],"Passwords must match").required("Required")});export const setNewPasswordSchemaInitialValues={password:"",confirmPassword:""};
